headline: Is There Opportunity in Federal Realty After New Urban Development Plans and Recent Price Moves?
summary: If you have ever wondered whether Federal Realty Investment Trust is truly a value play or just another name in real estate, you are not alone. This stock draws the attention of investors who are on the hunt for opportunity. Recently, the stock has edged up 0.8% over the past week and 3.4% over the last month. It is still down 11.6% over the past year, hinting at changing risk perceptions and moments of potential growth ahead. Market buzz lately has centered around Federal Realty's ongoing...
